name: Herra Hauki At Baltic Sea
description: The game, created in co-operation with Punainen Norsu, tells a story of a beloved character Herra Hauki at Baltic Sea. Herra Hauki is diving into an adventure in the shoreline and open waters of Baltic Sea. The story carries from the shorelines to farms and summer cottages teaching the child about the current state of the sea and the need to protect it. During the game the player will learn what eutrophication means and how the Global Warming effects the sea, what actions to preserve and protect has already been done and what there still is to do to save the Baltic Sea.
